jobs.title: Affiliate Growth Manager - Fogo
jobs.descriptionHtml:
Fogo is hiring an Affiliate Growth Manager to drive growth by sourcing, onboarding, and scaling high-impact affiliates while building lasting partnerships across crypto and fintech.

___

Location: Asia, Remote or optional office in Singapore

___

About Our Team and Your Role

We’re a well-rounded team: half of us are tech whizzes, while the other half excel in building partnerships with data providers, developers, and the DeFi community. Communication is key to our network-driven approach.

Remote Work: Our team is spread across the globe, from the US and South America to Europe and Asia, with an optional office in Porto, Portugal, and Singapore. Remote work is the norm here.

Language Proficiency: English proficiency is essential, as it’s our primary language of communication.

Startup-level speed: We thrive in the dynamic DeFi space and love adaptable problem solvers who are eager to meet the evolving needs of the market.

___

Your Responsibilities

  • Identify, source, and onboard new affiliates, including influencers, KOLs, media partners, schools, and personal networks.

  • Lead the complete onboarding journey: outreach, negotiations, contracts, training, and successful go-live.

  • Build and nurture strong affiliate relationships, serving as the primary point of contact for support and growth.

  • Design and launch targeted growth campaigns—by product or affiliate—such as tiered CPA programs.

  • Partner with affiliates to create and distribute compelling product content across their channels.

  • Collect market and partner feedback to inform product improvements and campaign strategies.

  • Track performance, monitor ROI, and refine commission structures and recruitment pipelines.

  • Organize online and offline affiliate events to boost engagement and community building.

  • Leverage analytics tools to monitor KPIs, identify trends, and drive data-informed decisions.

  • Collaborate cross-functionally with Marketing, Product, Finance, and Legal to align efforts with company objectives.

___

Desired Skills and Experience

  • 3+ years of experience in affiliate marketing, business development, or relationship management within the crypto, fintech, or banking sectors.

  • Proven track record in building, scaling, and managing successful affiliate networks.

  • Strong negotiation, contract management, and partnership development skills.

  • Proficient with CRM tools (e.g., HubSpot, Salesforce) and key social platforms (X, Telegram, YouTube).

  • Excellent project management, organizational, and multitasking abilities.

  • Highly driven, results-oriented, and resilient in fast-paced environments.

  • Proficiency in Asian languages (Mandarin, Korean, Japanese, Vietnamese, etc.) is a strong plus.

___

We’re building the most talented team in the world.

Think you’ve got what it takes? We’d love to meet you!

jobs.title: Software Engineer
jobs.descriptionHtml:
We're looking for skilled software engineers who are excited to build the market data infrastructure driving the future of decentralized finance. In this role, you'll develop backend services, write smart contracts, build developer SDKs, improve tooling and monitoring, and help shape the product itself. Your understanding of the DeFi landscape will be key in spotting opportunities and pushing the boundaries of what’s possible.

We're hiring engineers at multiple levels of seniority. If you're interested, please apply, and we will adjust the title based on your experience.

About Our Team and Your Role:

  • We're a balanced team; half of us are tech-talented people, while the other half excel in forging partnerships with data providers, developers, and the DeFi community - Communication is key in our network-driven approach.

  • Work remotely: Our team spans the globe from the US and South America to Europe and Asia, with an optional office in Porto, Portugal. Remote work is our norm.

  • English proficiency is essential as it's our medium for team and external developer communication.

  • Thrive in a startup environment within the dynamic DeFi space. We value adaptable problem solvers eager to address evolving market needs.

  • Write open-source software: Check out our open-source projects on GitHub for a sneak peek into our work.

  • User-centric development: Our success hinges on external developers engaging with our solutions—crafting user-friendly APIs and crystal-clear documentation that aligns with developers' needs.

Your Responsibilities

  • Engage in the ideation, creation, and upkeep of both on-chain and off-chain Pyth-related projects, including smart contracts, SDKs, and utility programs.

  • Influence our project's trajectory by working alongside business development and sales teams, shaping the future of finance.

  • Elevate our team by mentoring junior engineers and setting a high standard in software design and documentation.

  • Connect with the developer community, understand their requirements, and craft SDKs, documentation, and tools tailored to them.

Desired Skills and Experience:

  • At least 4 years of software engineering experience, with a bonus for experience in large-scale, safety-critical systems.

  • Smart contract and blockchain development is beneficial but not mandatory. For those without blockchain experience, we like to see backend engineering experience and an understanding of low-level programming languages (such as Rust or C++).

  • A zest for fast-paced, startup-like environments, adapting swiftly to the ever-changing DeFi market.

  • Keenness to learn or experience with Rust, Solidity, Python, and Typescript.

  • Exceptional technical communication skills for diverse interactions within and outside the team.

  • Ability to nurture engineers of varying skill levels.

  • Willingness to manage periodic on-call responsibilities.

Think you have what it takes? We’re looking forward to meeting you! 👋

jobs.title: CFO - Fogo
jobs.descriptionHtml:
At Douro Labs, we're building the next generation of decentralized infrastructure, and Fogo Chain is where that ambition meets execution.

From low-latency oracle integration to cutting-edge app development, our world-class team is dedicated to delivering products that drive results.

As a powerhouse of crypto-native development, Douro Labs combines deep protocol expertise with startup-level speed, delivering scalable, battle-tested products for some of the most important networks in the space.

Together, Fogo and Douro Labs are building the future of DeFi infrastructure — one block at a time.

Fogo Foundation is hiring a CFO to lead the design and execution of the Fogo Foundation’s financial strategy. The CFO will oversee budgeting, forecasting, cash-flow modeling, treasury operations, and key banking and crypto relationships to ensure long-term stability and support the network’s growth.

___

Location: Cayman Islands OR EST Time Zone locations (non-US)

___

About Our Team and Your Role

We’re a well-rounded team: half of us are tech whizzes, while the other half excel in building partnerships with data providers, developers, and the DeFi community. Communication is key to our network-driven approach.

Remote Work: Our team is spread across the globe, from the US and South America to Europe and Asia, with an optional office in Porto, Portugal, and Singapore. Remote work is the norm here.

Language Proficiency: English proficiency is essential, as it’s our primary language of communication.

Startup-level speed: We thrive in the dynamic DeFi space and love adaptable problem solvers who are eager to meet the evolving needs of the market.

___

Your Responsibilities

  • Lead the design and execution of the Fogo Foundation’s financial strategy, ensuring a strong and scalable finance function.

  • Own budgeting and forecasting, providing clear visibility and guidance on the Foundation’s financial position.

  • Design and maintain cash-flow models and reinvestment programs to support long-term growth and sustainability.

  • Build and manage the Finance team within the Foundation, setting standards for operational excellence.

  • Establish and oversee treasury operations, including banking, fiat, and crypto rails, and investment relationships.

  • Manage the daily operations of a well-funded treasury, ensuring liabilities are matched and capital is deployed effectively.

  • Identify, create, and lead new financial workstreams as the Foundation scales and the treasury grows.

___

Desired Skills and Experience

  • 10+ years in finance, treasury, or related leadership roles.

  • Background in traditional finance with proven transition into crypto and digital assets.

  • Strong expertise in treasury management, fiat/crypto payment rails, and investments.

  • Skilled in budgeting, forecasting, and liquidity planning.

  • Experience building and leading high-performing finance teams.

  • Familiar with international structures and digital asset regulations.

  • Cayman-based or willing to relocate; alternatively, non-US but ideally in the Eastern Time Zone.

___

We’re building the most talented team in the world.

Think you’ve got what it takes? We’d love to meet you!

jobs.title: Senior Product Designer
jobs.descriptionHtml:
We’re looking for an experienced Senior Product Designer to supercharge our design team. You’ll be crafting world-class interfaces for complex ecosystems, owning Figma-based workflows, and bridging the gap between design, product, and front-end development. A dash of web3 savvy wouldn’t hurt.

___

Location: Remote, Worldwide

___

About Our Team and Your Role

We’re a well-rounded team: half of us are tech whizzes, while the other half excel in building partnerships with data providers, developers, and the DeFi community. Communication is key to our network-driven approach.

Remote Work: Our team is spread across the globe, from the US and South America to Europe and Asia, with an optional office in Porto, Portugal, and Singapore. Remote work is the norm here.

Language Proficiency: English proficiency is essential, as it’s our primary language of communication.

Startup-level speed: We thrive in the dynamic DeFi space and love adaptable problem solvers who are eager to meet the evolving needs of the market.

___

Your Responsibilities

  • Lead UI design across multiple digital platforms with pixel-perfect execution.

  • Build and maintain a scalable, robust design system in Figma—including Auto Layout, variables, component sets, organizing and publishing libraries, and interactive prototyping.

  • Collaborate closely with engineers to convert designs into real, functioning features (you get HTML/CSS/JS enough to speak their language, ideally some experience with React projects).

  • Apply design thinking: user research, problem framing, ideation, prototyping, testing, and iterative refinement.

  • Bring clarity to complexity—especially for data-heavy, visually rich experiences.

  • Bonus: Proficiency in Framer design, development, and deployment process.

___

We expect you to bring

  • A portfolio that demonstrates elegant, data-centric UI work.

  • Proven ability to drive product-forward work end-to-end.

  • Comfort in fast-paced, ambiguous environments where you can own the design strategy and execution.

  • Strong communication skills for team collaboration and presenting ideas to stakeholders.

  • Clever ways of working: automating and optimizing the workflows around the design you deliver.

___

Desired Skills and Experience

  • 5+ years of experience in product or UI design.

  • Figma god-level skills: you’re fluent with Auto Layout, variables, component sets, organizing and publishing libraries, and prototyping.

  • Basic coding know-how: able to navigate HTML, CSS, and JavaScript well enough to collaborate with devs.

  • Solid practice of the design thinking process, from discovery to iteration.

  • Web3 (or related) experience—extra credit if you’ve tackled DeFi, crypto platforms, or blockchain interfaces.

___

Nice to have

  • Fintech, tradfi, or B2B software design background.

  • Strong data visualization and dashboard design chops.

  • Experience building or scaling design systems.

___

We’re building the most talented team in the world.

Think you’ve got what it takes? We’d love to meet you!

jobs.title: Affiliate Operations Manager - Fogo
jobs.descriptionHtml:
Fogo is hiring an Affiliate Operations Manager to oversee the full lifecycle of affiliate operations, from onboarding and compliance to data validation, payouts, reporting, and campaign support, ensuring our partners and business teams succeed together.

___

Location: Asia, Remote or optional office in Singapore

___

About Our Team and Your Role

We’re a well-rounded team: half of us are tech whizzes, while the other half excel in building partnerships with data providers, developers, and the DeFi community. Communication is key to our network-driven approach.

Remote Work: Our team is spread across the globe, from the US and South America to Europe and Asia, with an optional office in Porto, Portugal, and Singapore. Remote work is the norm here.

Language Proficiency: English proficiency is essential, as it’s our primary language of communication.

Startup-level speed: We thrive in the dynamic DeFi space and love adaptable problem solvers who are eager to meet the evolving needs of the market.

___

Your Responsibilities

  • Manage the full cycle of affiliate operations, including onboarding, contracts, and payouts.

  • Validate performance data, track commissions, and ensure accurate, timely payments in coordination with Finance.

  • Deliver regular performance reports, monitor KPIs, and recommend process improvements.

  • Serve as the main point of contact for affiliate Business Development Managers, collaborating with Finance, Legal, Product, and Marketing.

  • Handle affiliate requests, disputes, and compliance checks with professionalism and accuracy.

  • Maintain and refresh affiliate resources such as banners, creatives, and landing pages.

  • Plan, launch, and optimize affiliate campaigns; manage communications across Telegram, newsletters, and email.

  • Track and support the affiliate BD team’s tasks, incentives, and OKRs; run performance reviews and organize training sessions.

  • Collect affiliate feedback, translate it into actionable improvements, and update playbooks.

  • Partner with internal teams to support product feature launches and promotional campaigns.

  • Detect and prevent abuse or fraud, adjusting commission structures and promotions as needed.

  • Benchmark against competitor programs and provide insights to refine strategy.

___

Desired Skills and Experience

  • 2–4 years of experience in affiliate or digital marketing operations, ideally within crypto or fintech.

  • Solid understanding of affiliate program mechanics (e.g., tiered commissions, CPA models).

  • Strong analytical and data skills (Excel, Google Sheets <- must-have; SQL/BI tools a plus).

  • Highly detail-oriented, process-driven, and well-organized.

  • Proficiency in additional APAC languages is a plus.

___

We’re building the most talented team in the world.

Think you’ve got what it takes? We’d love to meet you!

jobs.title: Partnerships Lead - Fogo
jobs.descriptionHtml:
At Douro Labs, we're building the next generation of decentralized infrastructure, and Fogo Chain is where that ambition meets execution.

From low-latency oracle integration to cutting-edge app development, our world-class team is dedicated to delivering products that drive results.

As a powerhouse of crypto-native development, Douro Labs combines deep protocol expertise with startup-level speed, delivering scalable, battle-tested products for some of the most important networks in the space.

Together, Fogo and Douro Labs are building the future of DeFi infrastructure — one block at a time.

Fogo is hiring a Partnerships Lead to land Tier-1 protocols and fresh DeFi primitives—making Fogo the default place to build and trade. Own integrations end-to-end, keep bridges/oracles rock-solid, turn incentives and capital into TVL, and amplify the Fogo stack with wallets, dApps, and partners. Ideal: deep DeFi chops, genuine builder/trader relationships, and a track record of partnerships that ship and stick.

___

Location: Remote, Worldwide

___

About Our Team and Your Role

We’re a well-rounded team: half of us are tech whizzes, while the other half excel in building partnerships with data providers, developers, and the DeFi community. Communication is key to our network-driven approach.

Remote Work: Our team is spread across the globe, from the US and South America to Europe and Asia, with an optional office in Porto, Portugal, and Singapore. Remote work is the norm here.

Language Proficiency: English proficiency is essential, as it’s our primary language of communication.

Startup-level speed: We thrive in the dynamic DeFi space and love adaptable problem solvers who are eager to meet the evolving needs of the market.

___

Your Responsibilities

  • Ecosystem Growth — Source, court, and onboard Tier-1 protocols and fresh DeFi primitives. Own integrations end-to-end.

  • Ops & Infrastructure — Keep bridges, oracles, and core rails healthy, observable, and incident-ready. Track TVL, volume, liquidity, and user activity.

  • Founder Support — Bootstrap liquidity, sharpen UX, and shepherd launches. Build tailored go-to-market plans.

  • Incentives — Design performance-driven programs, set clear KPIs, measure impact, and iterate.

  • Capital Relations — Cultivate LPs, funds, market makers, and trading firms. Channel capital into Fogo-native DeFi.

  • Positioning & Narrative — Partner with product/marketing to package the Fogo stack and champion the vision with wallets, dApps, and communities.

  • Market Intelligence — Track trends, capital flows, and emerging primitives to surface new opportunities.

___

Desired Skills and Experience

  • 5+ years in DeFi/markets — protocol, L1/L2, or institutional trading experience.

  • Proven ecosystem growth/BD track record — partnerships that shipped, integrated, and drove adoption.

  • Strong network — founders, DeFi protocols, funds, LPs, and market makers.

  • Fluent in DeFi mechanics — TVL, volumes, liquidity/LP behavior, and incentive design.

  • Compelling storyteller — clear, credible communicator to technical and non-technical audiences.

  • Entrepreneurial builder — self-starter, resourceful, thrives in fast, changing environments.

___

We’re building the most talented team in the world.

Think you’ve got what it takes? We’d love to meet you!
